sections.title: EXPERTS IN SUSTAINABLE FARMING
sections.description: At Gronic, we have been developing a wide range of sustainable solutions for our clients for over 10 years. We purposefully design integrated pest management (IPM) programs that have minimal impact on the environment and a positive impact on public health and safety.

sections.title: SINCE 2012 CREATING INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS
sections.description: We were established in 2012 and, since the very first day, we have worked to maintain a prominent position in the market. The result is that, almost five years later, we have become a leading company and a benchmark in the biological protection sector for crops of all kinds.

sections.title: EVEN SEEMINGLY PERFECT SOLUTIONS CAN BE IMPROVED
sections.description: As consumers grow increasingly concerned about pesticides in their food and the environment, this is our mission to deal with these concerns by providing safer, non-toxic and environmentally-friendly pest control products for agriculture that have minimal impact on the environment and a positive impact on public health and safety.

sections.title: BEING AT YOUR SIDE THROUGHOUT THE CROP CYCLE. THAT IS OUR COMMITMENT!
sections.description: All farmers have a commitment to society to provide clearly and reliably traceable food. And ours is to be at their side to ensure they achieve it. Moreover, a healthy harvest without waste is the best guarantee for profitability and sustainability.
